revised_title: Extra-Uterine Pregnancy and the Removal of a Child from the Abdomen
tldr: A woman had a child in her abdomen for over 16 years, alongside having four other children. The child was eventually removed after the woman's death, revealing a rare case of extra-uterine pregnancy. This case study highlights the complexity of such conditions and challenges the belief that boys are conceived on the right side and girls on the left.
